formattedAddress: 1598 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1598 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029-6150, USA

originalText.text: Absolutely wonderful weekend at B&B! It feels like we stayed at a friend’s place in the city. Jonathan & Clement make you feel welcome and taken care of with the little things in your room. We had reusable shopping bags available, a list of locations for various things we may need like vetted restaurants, stores for batteries or other forgotten items, museums, shopping, subway route recommendations, etc. I’d recommend this place to anyone who wants to feel like a local during their stay. We hope to be back soon, thank you.

originalText.text: Comfortable furnished apartment a short walk from Mt Sinai. Made it easy to stay near the hospital during my surgery and recovery.

text.text: Comfortable furnished apartment a short walk from Mt Sinai. Made it easy to stay near the hospital during my surgery and recovery.

originalText.text:
What an amazing place to stay!  The hosts were available whenever needed, the apartment was extremely clean, well equipped and perfectly located.  Well thought details like a welcome basket and apples and umbrellas at the door sets this place apart from hotels.

Perfect place to stay if you need to be at Mt. Sinai hospital for business or family.  The neighborhood is great and walkable to midtown.  If you want a true NYC experience, this is the place to stay.

Looking forward to returning!

originalText.text: My husband and I loved this place! We spent a long weekend in NYC and wanted a more personal and homey experience then the over priced NYC hotels. We do not regret staying here and only wish we could have stayed a few more nights. The location is a few blocks from Central Park and Museum mile. We felt safe in the area and the room was very cozy and comfy (not to mention large by NYC standards). There is a great French café a block away and a few delicious places to grab a bite to eat. The 6 train takes you to everywhere else you might want to go in NYC as well. What a great find and cannot thank them enough for such great hospitality. Thank you for welcoming us into your "home". We will be back.

originalText.text: We spent our first vacation across the ocean at Bubba and Bean's place. The accommodation impressed us thanks to the great review, great location and especially thanks to recommendations for families with children. Communication with the owners was great - very quick and helpful. Accommodation has a great equipment, comfortable beds, it is clean with above-avarage amazing pro-client service you cannot find anywhere else. They even had a crib for our daughter, which was a game changer. It was quite difficult to find hotel that is well prepared for toddler. Thank you again for all your attention and we are sending our regards. I can only hope to come back here one day. Best regards, Veronika & Pavel, Diana and Natasa.
